title: UPDATED: Nils Eekhoff Fractures Jaw After Crashing into Lamp Post Head-On at AlUla Tour
content:
Dutch rider Eekhoff will miss six to eight weeks after a terrifying crash in the final kilometer of stage three at the 2025 AlUla Tour.

Read the full article at UPDATED: Nils Eekhoff Fractures Jaw After Crashing into Lamp Post Head-On at AlUla Tour on Velo.
author: ahood
